title: Lontor
author: Lontor
content: I have so many hdd in my store and I am thinking of building a chia mining desktop since last month, the time has finally arrive, I need an adapter ( if it ever exists ) that can give many rooms to SSD sata ports.

comments.body: You can use this kind of adapter, it turns 1 sata to 5 sata portsYou'll probably only find online, I used to buy at aliexpress, it's hard to find at physical storesAnother solution is to buy cases for your HDDs and connect via USB

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.created_time: October 01, 2022, 03:54:45 AMLast edit: October 01, 2022, 04:56:12 PM by JayDDee
comments.body: Don't use a SATA splitter, especially with SSDs. A single SSD will saturate SATA3 bandwidth, connecting 4 to 1 port is insane.It might be ok with slow HDDs where you don't care about speed.Better to use a PCIe [edit: or USB] SATA controller card as others have suggested.This is just general advice, not a comment about "mining" chia.
